text: (napiye!) Um mitu irakkappatta (ivvetat)taiyum, umakku munnar irakkappattulla (vetankal ya)varraiyum niccayamakat tankal nampikkai kontiruppataka evarkal catikkinranaro avarkalai nir parkkavillaiya? Purakkanikkappata ventumenru kattalaiyitappatta oru visamiyaiye avarkal (tankalukkut) tirppuk kurupavanaka akkikkolla virumpukinranar. (Visamiyakiya) anta saittano avarkalai veku turamana valikettil celuttave virumpukiran
